author: Gus_263
title: Another Va review
review: It's very cool for a little set. Like the va, are different comparing to the turaga. The head isn't symetrical, but it is great, and is maded with a shield, to like the green bohrok. Also includes a Krana. You can think that these little sets aren't awesome, but, can be using at creations.

author: BionicleBOOM
title: I lost his grey swords...
review:
But I replaced them with black ones.  So, he's a good set, and a good companion for Lehvak (see review on Kohrak Va).  I like how one arm moves up and down and the other launches the Krana through the air.  The color scheme looks a lot like Lehvak, and I like how Lego used Lehvak's tools as a head.  Stats:

Pros:

-One arm moves up and down

-One arm launches Krana

-Matches with Lehvak

-Big feet

Cons:

-Krana falls out of cradle (fix this with a rubber band lol)

-Head can't pivot from side to side, but you can modify that

Go get Lehvak and Lehvak Va today!!

author: mvila09
title: 8552 Lehvak Va
review: I love that it has unique and good pieces.Pros:Grey swords,Cool red eyes,Includes a rubber Krana,If you move one arm you can launch the Krana,Easy to build,Very easy to pose.Cons:The Krana falls out of the back,Lehvak has to bend his back to stand.*****5 stars.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Bohrok Va) - Lehvak Va Review
review:
This is a nice little figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only two pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 28 pieces and it was 3 USD when it was on sale. The price per piece ratio was 11 cents per piece which is a good value for this little figure!

The build

The build is very fun and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8552-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the head, the feet and the torso can be adjusted. On both hands you can see a ninja sword. The back has a piece where you can put a krana in, too. I really can't complain about this little figure - even if this set doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de



Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: Odeinoichus
title: Lehvak Va the Ninja
review:
Set #8552 Lehvak Va: This particular set is actually a good bet even if you aren't interested in impulse sets because it includes two extra ninja swords for your Mini-Figures... Of course then Lehvak Va won't have any hands, but that's what MOCing is for.

 

There isn't much else to say really about this set. If you're into Bionicle enough to want to own every single set then great, but if you're just a casual fan then you can skip the Bohrok Va, but you might still want to get this one as I said because you get two ninja swords with it.
